snippet: The two met in 1947 — early in the Yankees career of the beloved catcher Yogi Berra — when she was working as a waitress in St. Louis.
abstract: Carmen Berra, wife of Yoga Berra for nearly 70 years and among the most visible of New York Yankees wives, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: The two met in 1947 — early in the Yankees career of the beloved catcher Yogi Berra — when she was working as a waitress in St. Louis.

headline.main: Carmen Berra, Yogi’s Wife, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Carmen Berra, Yogi’s Wife, Dies at 85
